title: @Riot Can Miss Fortune Be Given A Visual Update?

embed.description: Closeup of Miss Fortune Zbrush! League of Legends: Miss Fortune Wip 7

body:
_I take no credit for the link, full credit goes to the DeviantArt.com user HazardousArts and I am just using the picture for an example, I did NOT create the picture._

As a {{champion:21}}  main I love her personality, her gameplay, and her splash art is stunning though her in-game model is definitely one of the more outdated ones in League of Legends, It's not bad by any means though it would be great if she would be given a model visual update.

replies.body: She looks alright for the most part; she's held up really well for such an old girl. The only issue I have with her visually is her hideous hair.
She could use the Renekton treatment. Don't change the animations, but fix up some of the model issues and textures. Just fix up her hair and modernize the textures and she should be just fine.

I would also like if she got an expanded VO, maybe give her some special interactions with Gangplank, Fizz, Nami, Nautilus or any of the Shadow Isles champions that attacked Bilgewater. She would also need some edited lore, removing any mentioning of the league is really the only thing it needs but still she needs it edited.

I could see Miss Fortune having her voices reworked totally too. Maybe having hidden taunts with other champions, especially Gangplank. Right now she only has a few lines and the lines she does have are odd.

"How do you like my guns shock in aaahh."

"Watch your mouth kid, or you'll find yourself responding at home.

(I know these aren't the words but until I actually focused on them, this is what they sounded like)

The person who voices her is amazing and fits her personality though, so if she would have a voice rework like Twitch did I hope that they use the same person. Just more lines and a few special interactions would be cool.
The first one you listed is actually, "How do you like my guns: Shock and Awe?" Like Jinx, MF named her weapons.
Yeah, at first they just sounded like that to me because the words aren't really clear until you pay attention to it at first I was like wtf is this but I caught onto it.
I think Kog'Maw, Shaco, Shen, Udyr, Poppy and Pantheon need vu's waay more than MF maybe even Malphite

Pantheon got a Visual Update, Poppy is getting one, Udyr has so many good skins nobody even realises his model is outdated in classic verison, Shen, Shaco, and Kog'Maw I could see getting visual updates though. Especially Shaco.
Pantheon only got texture upgrade, he still has huge feet and a spear that looks like it's made from Aluminium

> [{quoted}](name=Phantom Panther,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=E20eAAje,comment-id=0018,timestamp=2015-04-04T14:42:26.790+0000)
>
> I think Kog'Maw, Shaco, Shen, Udyr, Poppy and Pantheon need vu's waay more than MF maybe even Malphite

How DARE you forget Taric? Pizza Feet top that list long before anyone else (except Udyr, who has box feet), but still, Taric is in desperate need of an update, which is thankfully in the works.
Yup my bad, forgot about the gem fetish guy

Can't remember the last time I saw Miss Fortune in game; she could use a little love.

Though I hardly touch ADCs, let alone Miss Sarah Fortune, I would love it if she set sail with a fancy Visual Update.

Miss Fortune is extremely powerful for an ADC but there are a few others than are definitely stronger than her and more viable, still she's very powerful and I would say 19/20 games I play I get fed with her and often carry. While I don't think she needs much of a gameplay update I think her having a nice visual update would help her become more popular. I'm not saying champions should be popular based on appearences, but who would want to play an ugly champion over a stunningly gorgeous champion.

(As I write this I actually am really fed in a game as Miss Fortune.)

I'd like to take an example of what Visual Updates often do though.  Before Twitch's visual update he wasn't played often and nobody realized how strong he was.  Afterward he had a popularity spike and turned out, he was pretty strong.  Then he got nerfed.... hard.

That's very true though I honestly think Miss Fortune is sort of the same way just looking at her kit, she has great potential for teamfights, one of the strongest laning phase ADCs, and she also has the ability to roam + she out trades every ADC early game by far just because of her Q and it resets/her W gives extra damage but I don't think she's overpowered like Twitch was due to her decent skill base, having actual skill shots, and if you get behind with her in laning phase then you're useless the rest of the game.

Yeah, I see what you mean here.  The difference between her and Twitch was that Twitch was able to have a decent early (his DOT damage was higher early and his stealth was much more reliable) and a godlike lategame.  Miss Fortune has a stronger early game and her lategame is still strong (as with all ADC's) but she's no hyper carry.  I imagine her popularity would spike a good bit but I can't see her being nerfed.

> [{quoted}](name=A Superb Villain,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=E20eAAje,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-04-03T23:21:39.048+0000)
>
> Can't remember the last time I saw Miss Fortune in game; she could use a little love.
> 
> Though I hardly touch ADCs, let alone Miss Sarah Fortune, I would love it if she set sail with a fancy Visual Update.

Da puns ;)
http://media.tumblr.com/8155c6d4806e07efb4df70f42b759c24/tumblr_inline_n54u8bWsxs1qgt12i.gif
Not that model, though.  Doesn't fit the art style whatsoever, and is way too hyper-realistic.  I can understand wanting a VU, but it better not look like that.

Actually the one who made this model also made the model for Sona's MTU: http://hazardousarts.deviantart.com/ http://hazardousarts.deviantart.com/art/Sona-Visual-Update-Low-Poly-and-Textures-477066360?q=gallery%3AHazardousArts%2F827119&qo=42

And, to me at least, both models (The Sona one and the MF one) seem to be in the same quality. :)
Here's another pic of his/her MF model for you to take another look: http://hazardousarts.deviantart.com/art/League-of-Legends-Miss-Fortune-Wip-6-398576871
She still has that bug on her default skin where it never stops emitting smoke...

> [{quoted}](name=Gigahappytown,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=E20eAAje,comment-id=0017,timestamp=2015-04-04T14:38:55.691+0000)
>
> She still has that bug on her default skin where it never stops emitting smoke...

Actually the smoke is an indication of her crit chance, the more smoke means you have more crit chance
http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Miss_Fortune/SkinsTrivia

I saw this lovely contest submission in Polycount. I have a masterpost of the good stuff right [**here**](http://nicosarea.tumblr.com/post/106410904510/this-is-what-league-of-legends-wishes-it-would) if you want to check it out!
Holy crap. So much good stuff in that link.
Brace yourselves.  Fappening III is coming.
You're the one saying you like her "personality".

>love her personality

All of her vocal lines are basically moaning and panting. Is this serious?
Are you saying she has lines?
Yes please.
Only been up for a few minutes and a lot of people seem to have noticed it, awesome that a lot of people care about Miss Fortune.

I think if Miss Fortune gets visually updated, she needs to be more bounty hunter and less whore. She comes from a design standpoint of someone trying to design and sell big boobs to people, and I think it kind of detracts from her. It's OK to have some cleavage and some skin showing, but like Evelynn, Miss Fortune just isn't tastefully done and should be updated to reflect current visual philosophies akin to Ahri, Katarina, and Syndra.

Yeah, making her more of a Bounty Hunter would be cool. Right now she looks like a Barmaid/Pirate, which I think is kinda cool but there's not a whole lot to say that she's a world renown bounty hunter that's hunting after some of the most powerful pirates in the world. I want her to still have a pirate-ish look since she did grow up in that area but I also want her to feel like I'm playing a Bounty Hunter.

It would be nice to have a Visual Update on her, I find her a really fun ADC. She carried me through all of Silver. Although I have forgotten my build on her and am not sure what exactly do build. Fortune Mains could you give me some help?

Pretty much always get Infinity Edge and then Phantom Dancer, really the Shiv isn't worth it since Phantom Dancer's stats are far better and in my opinion the passive can be life saving. After that if your team is heavy AD then buy a Black Cleaver, it can really vary from here. Sometimes I buy a second Phantom Dancer, or a Bloodthirster, Last Whisper, Blade of the Ruined King. It pretty much depends after your first two items on what you feel like buying.

> [{quoted}](name=DErpMAstEr651,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=E20eAAje,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2015-04-04T05:31:50.104+0000)
>
> It would be nice to have a Visual Update on her, I find her a really fun ADC. She carried me through all of Silver. Although I have forgotten my build on her and am not sure what exactly do build. Fortune Mains could you give me some help?

I generally either build build Crit (IE, SS/PD, LW) or Caster (YGB, BT, LW).
MF is my favorite character and I absolutely agree that she needs a VU, and a gameplay update but that's neither here nor there. I love the model shown.
U tyrant, that's very good!

Riot did say that she has a lot of assets ready for a MTU or a VU, a few months ago. Also, the guy/girl who made this MF model also made the model for Sona's MTU. I think that this might be the ready assets they were talking about, but I'm not sure. :)
If there's anything she needs from a model update, it's some "bounce" to her step. ;)
Make her look more like Lana Del Ray (͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
+1 More boobs... I mean, an updated look for my favorite bounty hunter :)
So far so good hopefully a Rioter will respond and let us know if there are any plans for Miss Fortune in the near future.

Maybe a kit rework while they are at it.. shes no longer viable with all this mobility champs that are now in league. Her ult is definitely shows that its no longer viable with lol new champ philosophy.

Miss Fortune is very much viable, I just went 10/0 in a game with her and I just dueled my friend (who mains Draven) with Miss Fortune and still won.

She's probably the strongest early game ADC in the game, even stronger than Caitlyn really and is one of the best ADC duelists because of her auto attack resets and her W passive plus her E can help do extra damage. Miss Fortune's ult alone can win teamfights and is perfect for last hitting due to it's range, plus when her passive is up she has a really high base movement speed and it's not uncommon for MF players to get Boots of Mobility so they have around 500 movement speed I think?

Trust me MF is viable, she's hard to play and harder to master but it's so rewarding. When I first bought her my typical game was like, 0/7/1 now I usually get about 14/2/6 or something like that and just carry the game.

She's the character that got me into this game. I still play her above the other ADCs,  but it's difficult when so many of them have the escapes and gap closers. Not to mention her abilities scale with AP and in my experience AP MF is usually more frustrating than it is enjiyable. I was excited to hear that they have her lined up for an update, though it's likely a long ways away still.

Agreed, Miss Fortune is pretty mobile early game due to her passive and if you get boots it's really easy to dodge skillshots, but as soon as you get hit by any damage it's down. After that your only escape is your E which isn't the best but it's actually a pretty good ability once you've mastered it.

(Playing MF in URF is spamming 2 - 3 rings of E at once under your enemy's tower lol.)
I've only played a couple of times this past week, but I'm Donnelly going to play her this weekend. Win or lose, I never regret picking her.

i agree i love both her personalities.
....
the fast moving one and the shooting up one
I am all for a visual update, she deserves one!
I want this.
